mapper.update: update album set aname = #{aname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aimg = #{aimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adetail = #{adetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, areserve2 = #{areserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select aid, aname, aimg, mid, adetail, areserve2 from album
